keywords: ['bluegrass', 'country', 'instrumental', 'no voice', 'no percussion', 'mandolin', 'acoustic guitar', 'banjo', 'double bass', 'moderate tempo', 'happy mood']
caption: This bluegrass song features a solo played on a mandolin. This is accompanied by an acoustic guitar strumming chords. A double bass plays the root note and fifth of the chords. A banjo player fills in between phrases. This song is at a moderate tempo and has a country feel. The mood of this song is happy. This song can be played in an inspirational movie.
